content.rendered:
Dental Veneers

Dental Veneers Gardena, CA

Your self-esteem can be immensely affected if you are dissatisfied with your smile. If you avoid smiling or feel uncomfortable with the appearance of your teeth, perhaps porcelain veneers would be the option you are looking for.

Our cosmetic dentists are experts with custom porcelain veneers. Veneers will complement your facial features and enable you to feel more confident and self-assured.

What is a Dental Veneer?

Veneers are very thin shells made of porcelain or resin. Our dentists will bond these veneers to the front of your teeth to immediately enhance the beauty of your smile. Our custom veneers can be applied to one tooth or your entire smile.

Porcelain veneers are popular because the color and translucency of porcelain is a great match for the natural appearance of tooth enamel; plus, they are stain-resistant and retain their brightness for years.

Main Reasons to Apply Veneers:

  • Close gaps between teeth
  • Whiten severely discolored teeth
  • Correct appearance of irregularly shaped teeth
  • Correct slightly crooked teeth
  • Restore broken, chipped or worn teeth

Who is a Good Candidate for Dental Veneers?

Many patients request veneers if they are unhappy with their smile and feel self-conscious. Dental veneers quickly correct typical smile imperfections, enabling patients to speak, laugh and smile with restored confidence.

Book Your Appointment Now
